items.title: Sudan accuses UAE of 'complicity in genocide' at world court
items.description: Sudan's government alleges that the UAE is arming its civil war opponents, which it denies.

items.title: Girl, 17, whose dad is lost in nightclub rubble spends birthday at scene
items.description: Shailyn Peña is one of many whose loved ones are missing after the roof of a nightclub collapsed in Santo Domingo.

items.title: Zimbabwe makes first compensation payments to white farmers over land grabs
items.description: This is the first payment under a deal aimed at helping Zimbabwe mend its relations with the West.

items.title: Woman jailed over £39 donation to Ukraine freed in US-Russia prisoner swap
items.description: Russian-American Ksenia Karelina was released by Moscow in return for the freeing of Russian-German Arthur Petrov.

items.title: Zelensky claims 155 Chinese fighting for Russia in Ukraine
items.description: It follows Beijing's denial that many of its citizens are involved in the conflict.
